concept.display: Erroneous patient information provide by requestor, result does not belong to this patient, charge credited and requestor notified.
Lab error, result does not belong to this patient, charge credited and requestor notified.
Order error by requestor, wrong patient tested, charges credited.
Order error, wrong test performed, charges credited.
Patient did not return for specimen collection
Patient unable to collect urine specimen.
Specimen does not appear to be adequate for requested assay
Specimen lab was missing required information
Specimen leaked in transit.Â Request new sample.
Specimen lost due to laboratory accident
Specimen not received as of 1 month post order. Charges adjusted accordingly.
Specimen not received in the lab
Test not performed on formed stools
The specimen was not received at Intermountain Central Lab for testing. The sending site was notified.
Unable to determine due to color interference
Unable to report platelet count due to platelet clumping; platelets appear adequate on smear

description: A list of reasons why a lab result may have no value
name: LabNullFlavor

text.div:
LabNullFlavor

A list of reasons why a lab result may have no value

Copyright Statement: IHC

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:
